# selectedTool

**Instance Property**

The currently selected tool in the tool picker.

## Declaration

```swift
var selectedTool: any PKTool { get set }
```

## Discussion

This is one of the available tools associated with a [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKCanvasView] that adopt the [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKTool-swift.protocol] protocol.
